H0.text: What alcoholic drink whose name means 'little water' was first distilled from grain in the 8-9th centuries in NE Europe. Aquavit

H1.text: What alcoholic drink whose name means 'little water' was first distilled from grain in the 8-9th centuries in NE Europe. Korn

H2.text: What alcoholic drink whose name means 'little water' was first distilled from grain in the 8-9th centuries in NE Europe. Brennivin

H3.text: What alcoholic drink whose name means 'little water' was first distilled from grain in the 8-9th centuries in NE Europe. Vodka

A4.text: The word vodka is a diminutive of the Slavic word voda 'water' (literally, 'little water').

A5.text: Vodka was originally distilled from wine.
